column4: anyone know how i could paste 2 images side by side with imagemagick ?
no idea with imagemagic  but in xpaint you just paste the one and move it to where you want it, then paste the second and do the same...
well the thing about imagemagick is it's a series of command line tools, that way I can incorporate this into a script, and remove the monotony :-)
then i would assume it will support a position string.   maybe the man pages can help   idk.
